thread.title: Richard Michal
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Richard Michal

author: Richard Michal
title: Richard Michal
text: Although I had an issue on arrival I called customer service and was connected with a real person in less then 30 seconds. I explained my issue to a very polite service rep and the issue was immediately resolved as such the reason for 4 starts. To me a sign of a great company is one that not only has a great product, but even more so what occurs when/if an issue arises. After discussing the problem with her I admit my issue could reasonably have been interpreted by some as a misunderstanding on my part, based on ordering more so on the photo then the language in the write-up. However they agreed that the photo should have been a bit more accurate and simply due to my dissatisfaction the company made it 100% right. Certainly a top company and I will continue to highly recommend and do business with in the future.
